summary_gpt: Excel Industries Limited has scheduled a board meeting on May 14, 2025, to approve its audited financial results for the year ending March 31, 2025, and to consider dividend recommendations. The company has also announced the continuation of the trading window closure until May 16, 2025, in compliance with insider trading regulations.

Excel Industries Limited has scheduled a board meeting on May 14, 2025, to approve its audited financial results for the year ending March 31, 2025, and to consider dividend recommendations. The company has also announced the continuation of the trading window closure until May 16, 2025, in compliance with insider trading regulations.

Excel Industries Limited has disclosed that it does not qualify as a 'Large Corporate' under SEBI regulations and has no outstanding long-term borrowings as of March 31, 2025. The company maintains high credit ratings and adheres to multiple ISO standards, indicating strong compliance and operational stability.
